name: On-the-Fly .NET Compiler
short_description: On-the-Fly .NET Compiler - tool or library for compilation CLR language in real time, also in memory, and following execution. This can be used for desktop and web scripting, remote compilation, etc. It's free, written on C# and multiplatform.
